name: Fade Away (itch) (Jade Studios, JustinCheung6, Panster, waywardsamurai, Jessica Wei)
name_original: Fade Away (itch) (Jade Studios, JustinCheung6, Panster, waywardsamurai, Jessica Wei)
description: Beta version of the game about a boy named Parker, who dies tragically in an accident and finds himself in a world between life and death. Now he must do everything he can to not fade away, all while trying to uncover the fate of his brother.
